verses.verse: לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> come נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <S%H7442><s%> let us sing לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <S%H7321><s%> let us make a joyful noise לְצ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> to the rock יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3468><s%> of our salvation

נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <S%H6923><s%> Let us come פָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before his presence בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> with thanksgiving בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <S%H2158><s%> unto him with psalms נָרִ֥יעַֽ <S%H7321><s%> and make a joyful noise לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] a great יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> above all gods

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <S%H3027><s%> In his hand מֶחְקְרֵי־ <S%H4278><s%> [are] the deep places אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <S%H8443><s%> the strength הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> of the hills לֽוֹ׃

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֣וֹ הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> The sea וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who עָשָׂ֑הוּ <S%H6213><s%> [is] his and he made וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת <S%H3006><s%> the dry יָדָ֥יו <S%H3027><s%> it and his hands יָצָֽרוּ׃ <S%H3335><s%> formed

בֹּ֭אוּ <S%H935><s%> O come נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <S%H7812><s%> let us worship וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <S%H3766><s%> and bow down נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <S%H1288><s%> let us kneel לִֽפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> our maker

כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> He אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> For he [is] our God וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and we [are] the people מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <S%H4830><s%> of his pasture וְצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> and the sheep יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> of his hand הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> To day אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּקֹל֥וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> if ye will hear

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H7185><s%> Harden לְ֭בַבְכֶם <S%H3824><s%> not your heart כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <S%H4808><s%> as in the provocation כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [and] as [in] the day מַ֝סָּ֗ה <S%H4531><s%> of temptation בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> When נִ֭סּוּנִי <S%H5254><s%> tempted אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> When your fathers בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <S%H974><s%> me proved גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> though רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> me and saw פָעֳלִֽי׃ <S%H6467><s%> my work

אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> Forty שָׁנָ֨ה ׀ <S%H8141><s%> years אָ֘ק֤וּט <S%H6962><s%> long was I grieved בְּד֗וֹר <S%H1755><s%> with [this] generation וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and said עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> It [is] a people תֹּעֵ֣י <S%H8582><s%> that do err לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> in their heart הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְ֝הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they have not known דְרָכָֽי׃ <S%H1870><s%> my ways

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> Unto whom I sware בְאַפִּ֑י <S%H639><s%> in my wrath אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Truly יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <S%H935><s%> that they should not enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <S%H4496><s%> into my rest
